gcci.text: At $3.16/hr for H100s, persistent supply constraints are limiting new chip availability, pushing hyperscalers to defer capex until inventory normalizes or cheaper alternatives emerge.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek’s $1.25/1M input token average compresses API margins and escalates price competition, accelerating a shift toward more efficient models and aggressive inference optimization.

gagl.text: 120 TWh of annual AI load amplifies grid strain, likely accelerating nuclear and long-duration storage adoption to stabilize baseload and curb carbon intensity.

aipi.text: Cooling hardware capex amid token price deflation suggests industry sentiment is cautious yet resilient, lowering bubble risk while sustaining AI growth through efficiency gains.
